com.thesmartweb.lshrank

Class Search_analysis

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.thesmartweb.lshrank.Search_analysis

  • public class Search_analysis
extends Object
    Class for analysis of all the queries through Search APIs and capturing of the result statistics
    Author:
    Themistoklis Mavridis

    • Method Detail

      • perform

        public List<String> perform(int iteration_counter,
                            String directory_save,
                            String domain,
                            List<Boolean> enginechoice,
                            String quer,
                            int results_number,
                            int top_visible,
                            List<Double> LSHrankSettings,
                            double alpha,
                            List<Boolean> mozMetrics,
                            int top_count_moz,
                            boolean moz_threshold_option,
                            double moz_threshold,
                            List<Boolean> ContentSemantics,
                            int SensebotConcepts,
                            String config_path)
        Method to perform the queries to the search engines, get the links and get all the webpage and semantic stats for the links
        Parameters:
        iteration_counter - The iteration number of the algorithm (to use it in the id for elasticsearch)
        directory_save - The directory we are going to several files
        domain - The domain that we are searching for (to use it in the id for elasticsearch)
        enginechoice - The search engines that were chosen to be used
        quer - the query we search for
        results_number - the results number that we are going to get from every search engine
        top_visible - the number of results if we use Visibility score
        LSHrankSettings - the settings for LDA and LSHrank in general (check the ReadInput Class)
        alpha - alpha value of LDA
        mozMetrics - the metrics of choice if Moz is going to be used
        top_count_moz - the amount of results if we use Moz
        moz_threshold_option - flag to show if we are going to use a threshold in Moz metrics or not
        moz_threshold - the moz threshold value
        ContentSemantics - get the choice of Content Semantic Analysis algorithm that we are going to use
        SensebotConcepts - the amount of concepts to be recognized if Sensebot is used
        config_path - the configuration path to get all the api keys
        Returns:
        a list with the words recognized as important by the content semantic analysis algorithm we have chosen
